Interface NewsSpreader (Github)

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainSpreader
public interface NewsSpreader
An interface for spreading news.

  • Method Summary

    Method

  • Method Details

    • registerTrustedSource

      boolean registerTrustedSource(String source, String pwd)
      Registers a trusted news-source.
      Parameters:
      source - a string used to identify the source
      pwd - a password that allows to authenticate the source when spreading news
      Returns:
      false if source is null or already registered or if pwd is null or empty , true otherwise
      
public boolean registerTrustedSource(String source, String pwd);

    • registerNewsReceiver

      boolean registerNewsReceiver(NewsReceiver newsReceiver)
      Registers a new NewsReceiver
      Parameters:
      newsReceiver - NewsReceiver to be registerd
      Returns:
      false if NewsReceiver was already registered, true otherwise
      
public boolean registerNewsReceiver(NewsReceiver newsReceiver);

    • unregisterNewsReceiver

      boolean unregisterNewsReceiver(NewsReceiver newsReceiver)
      Unregisters a new NewsReceiver
      Parameters:
      newsReceiver - NewsReceiver to be removed
      Returns:
      if the NewsReceiver was successfully removed, false if e.g. was not registered
      
public boolean unregisterNewsReceiver(NewsReceiver newsReceiver);

    • blockWord

      boolean blockWord(String word2block, boolean redact)
      Registers a word to be blocked from spreading. All behaviors on blocked words is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      word2block - a word that must not be spread in subsequent calls to `spreadNews`. If the same word has already been registered for blocking, it applies the new redacting status to the word
      redact - if true, every occurrence of word2block in news to be spread is replaced with one single # if false, the entire piece of news that includes the word must not be spread (see `spreadNews`)
      Returns:
      true if successful, false for invalid arguments or if word2block is not a word
      
public boolean blockWord(String word2block, boolean redact);

    • unblockWord

      boolean unblockWord(String word2free)
      Unblocks a word for spreading. Cancels the effect of any previous `blockContents` with the same word.
      Parameters:
      word2free - A word that maybe was previously blocked.
      Returns:
      true if parameter is valid and a word, false otherwise
      
public boolean unblockWord(String word2free);

    • spreadNews

      String spreadNews(String news, String source, String pwd) throws NewsSpreaderException
      Sends the `news` string to every registered news-receiver (respecting the blocking policy as configured with `blockContents`).
      Parameters:
      news - a string that contains the news to be spread
      source - the source of the news (which must be already registered)
      pwd - the password (must match the registered password for this source)
      Returns:
      the actual piece of news spread
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if at least one argument is null; otherwise, see below
      UntrustedSourceException - when the source was not registered before
      AuthenticationException - when the source was registered with a different password
      BlockedContentException - when authentication ok, but news contains blocked content with no redaction
      NewsSpreaderException
      
public String spreadNews(String news, String source, String pwd)
        throws NewsSpreaderException;
